# NSSwapBigFloatToHost(_:)

**Function**

Swaps the bytes of a number.

## Declaration

```swift
func NSSwapBigFloatToHost(_ x: NSSwappedFloat) -> Float
```

## Discussion

Converts the big-endian value in `x` to the current endian format and returns the resulting value. If it is necessary to swap the bytes of `x`, this function calls [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSwapFloat(_:)] to perform the swap.

## Related Documentation

- **NSSwapHostFloatToBig(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapLittleFloatToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
